short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension converts epoch to human readable

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is simple offline epoch convertor which do exactly what it says: convert Epoch to Human Readable format and from Human Readable format to Epoch. You can also specify time zone to use while converting human readable to Epoch.
